title: Issues of today!!
body: Lately i have been getting this strange problem where when i skip waiting for stats, my next game the ping goes up to 1000+ for some strange reason idk if any1 else has this problem

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Ke Yi Xiong Di,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=LGxBjEcE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-28T08:10:36.214+0000)
>
> Me 2

Well i hope they do something about it because i can't be getting queue for game related problems

High latency (ping) is largely affected by your local network settings or ISP routing to the server. As a first step in troubleshooting this, I recommend ensuring your local settings are gravy by checking out our [connection guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if those settings changed anything.
